page_contents.heading: Element Reference
page_contents.label: This site includes all elements currently supported by BobuxNet Browser, by order of addition.
Heading:
page_contents.heading: I am a heading. You can make me bold and set my font size just like labels!
page_contents.label: Label:
I am a label. You can make me bold (bold=true) and sent the font size (size="12")
Horizontal Line:
Link:
page_contents.link: I am a link aligned to the center
I am a link aligned to the right
page_contents.label: Spacer:
A spacer adds a vertical space between two elements of set size. e.g.
